article:
My friends and I recently returned from our annual week at the beach.  While we were there, a couple of us needed to  pickup  a few goods at the grocery store.
  As we were   _  out,
the cashier praised me for my necklace.I thanked her, and she asked   _  .I bought it.I had gotten it at the department store just down the street, and told her that it was on sale for 40%   _  .My friend suggested that she should walk over and purchase one during her    _  .But the cashier said she couldn't   _  it
right now.
  As we left the grocery store, I told my friend I   _  to buy one for her. She agreed, and offered to   _  for
half. So we went back to the department store and picked out a   _  necklace for the
cashier. As we paid for it, the sales lady noticed that I was   _  the same one.
"You   _  really
like this necklace," she commented.
 We told her   _  we were buying it for. To our surprise, the sales lady knew her!
"She is a very sweet lady," she remarked, "But she is going througha  _  patch right now
and has to drive a long way to work. With gas   _  so high it
sure isn't easy."
 With   _  ,we took the gift back to the grocery store and stood in  _  at the same cash register. When our time came we just handed her the gift.   She knew   _  what we had done
and was so  _  .
 It feels so good to do nice things for   _  .I grew up poor, with a  _  mother and two
sisters and I never dreamed as a little girl that I would be able to help
others.
